    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
      java.lang.String race,
      java.lang.String color)
        Player class represents a game player Throw a NullPointerException or IllegalArgumentException if the paramaters are invalid
        Parameters:
        name - The player's name. Must be a String between 3 and 100 characters long
        race - The player's race. Must be Human, Flapper, Bonzoid, Ugaite, or Buzzite
        color - The player's color. Must be Red, Blue, Pink, Green, or Orange
